name: Too Impatient
description:
TOO IMPATIENT

STORY:

 One day, a young highschool boy calls a girl to meet up for an important confession. 

The boy wakes up late on the day of the confession and tries to makes a run for it, but was struck by a fatal car accident. He ends up being sent to hell to be tortured by his tormentor for eternity. He is dead.

Commited to go back and make that confession, he begs to his tormentor. The demon makes him undergo a test for him to prove his desperation.

FEATURES:

- Short and straightforward gameplay (Approx. half an hour)

- A demon that loves to torture people (mentally)

- A stupid highschool boy that doesn't look both ways before crossing the street

- Custom graphics and original character design by Denkolatte

- An absurdly dumb story that was made up on a whim over the school break...

- two endings
